name: Drillmin
description:
A Game for Ludum Dare 48, "Deeper and Deeper"

As a note, this game will probably be expanded on in the future! What you see here is a preview of what is to come...

Art, Programming and Main theme music by DPS2004

Music and Sound effects by bunner

Love2D libraries used:

Baton by tesselode

flux by rxi

json.lua by rxi

lovebird by rxi

TEsound by Taehl
